history.proof: intros. inversion H. symmetry in H1. destruct H1 as [msg' [H2 H3]]. unfold getSt_server. shelve.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'" on hypothesis of type "st :-> m = getLocal server d".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
d: dstatelet
C: ResourceCoh d
m: server_state

Goal:
getLocal server d = st :-> m -> getSt_server C = m

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
ResourceCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
nid = nat : Set
getSt_server : forall d : dstatelet, ResourceCoh d -> server_state
st = ptr_nat 1 : ptr
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
Record server_state : Set := ServerState { current_epoch : nat; current_value : value; outstanding : seq request } Arguments ServerState _%nat_scope _ _%seq_scope
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet C : ResourceCoh d m : server_state |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet C : ResourceCoh d m : server_state |- ?A -> Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet C : ResourceCoh d m : server_state |- Type]
getLocal_coh : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), ResourceCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == server then exists ss : server_state, getLocal n d = st :-> ss else n \in clients /\ getLocal n d = Unit)
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet C : ResourceCoh d m : server_state |- Type]
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
getLocal_server_st_tp : forall d : dstatelet, ResourceCoh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal server d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = server_state
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
server_local_coh = fun ss : server_state => [Pred h | h = st : -> ss] : server_state -> Simpl_Pred heapUMC
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Record tuple_of (n : nat) (T : Type) : Type := Tuple { tval : seq T; _ : is_true (size tval == n) } Arguments tuple.tuple_of _%nat_scope _%type_scope Arguments tuple.Tuple [n]%nat_scope [T]%type_scope [tval]%seq_scope
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
local_coh = fun n : nid => [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == server then exists ss : server_state, server_local_coh ss h else n \in clients /\ client_local_coh h)] : nid -> Simpl_Pred (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
nodes = [:: server] ++ clients : seq nid
hcancelPtV : forall (A : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A), valid (x :-> v1) -> x : -> v1 = x : -> v2 -> v1 = v2
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
hcancelPtT : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 : A1) (v2 : A2), valid (x :-> v1) -> x : -> v1 = x : -> v2 -> A1 = A2
hcancelPtV2 : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : ptr) (v1 v2 : A), valid (x1 :-> v1) -> x1 : -> v1 = x2 : -> v2 -> (x1, v1) = (x2, v2)
hcancelPtT2 : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (x1 x2 : ptr) (v1 : A1) (v2 : A2), valid (x1 :-> v1) -> x1 : -> v1 = x2 : -> v2 -> (x1, A1) = (x2, A2)
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
hcancel2V : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x1 :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x1 : -> v1 \+ h1 = x2 : -> v2 \+ h2 -> if x1 == x2 then v1 = v2 /\ h1 = h2 else [/\ free x1 h2 = free x2 h1, h1 = x2 : -> v2 \+ free x1 h2 & h2 = x1 : -> v1 \+ free x2 h1]
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Protocols.Exports.nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
consume_coh : forall (d : dstatelet) (m : mid), ResourceCoh d -> soup_coh (consume_msg (dsoup d) m)
hcancelV : forall (A : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x : -> v1 \+ h1 = x : -> v2 \+ h2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid h1 & h1 = h2]
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
hcancelT : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 : A1) (v2 : A2) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x : -> v1 \+ h1 = x : -> v2 \+ h2 -> A1 = A2
soup_coh = Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> active ms -> coh_msg ms)] : Pred soup
coh_dom_upd : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> ResourceCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
cancelO : forall (A : Type) (h1 h2 : heap) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (f1 : partition (x :-> v1) h1) (f2 : partition (x :-> v2) h2), valid f1 -> f1 = f2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid h1 & h1 = h2]
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
defPtUnO : forall (A : Type) (h : heap) (x : ptr) (v : A) (f : partition (x :-> v) h), valid f = [&& x != null, valid h & x \notin dom h]
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap

``` 
intros. unfold getLocal. simpl. intros. inversion H. symmetry in H1. apply find_mark in H1. destruct H1 as [msg' [H2 H3]]. unfold st in H2. unfold getSt_server. rewrite H2. assumption.
```

original: intros. unfold getLocal. simpl. intros. inversion H. symmetry in H1. apply find_mark in H1. destruct H1 as [msg' [H2 H3]]. unfold st in H2. unfold getSt_server. rewrite H2. auto.
